hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD{10}{:}{\blueD{52}}$ because it is located $\blueD{52}$ ticks from $\redD{10}{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD{10}{:}{00} $ looks like this:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 10 and the long hand on the 12. !

hints.content:
And just like the number line in the question, $10{:}{\blueD{52}}$ is $\blueD{52}$ ticks from $10{:}{00}.$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled with the minutes it represents as follows: 0 minutes is at the 12, 5 minutes is at the 1, 10 minutes is at the 2, 15 minutes is at the 3, 20 minutes is at the 4, 25 minutes is at the 5, 30 minutes is at the 6, 35 minutes is at the 7, 40 minutes is at the 8, 45 minutes is at the 9, 50 minutes is at the 10, and 55 minutes is at the 11. Tick marks are also shown every 1 minute. The short hand is between the 10 and 11 and the long hand is on the second tick mark after the 10. A line extends through the long hand to further show that the long hand is on the second tick mark after 50. !
A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 10 and 11 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 10. !

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 10:00 to 11:00 with tick marks at every minute unit. The 15-minute tick marks are labeled. The 10:52 mark is labeled A. !

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and the 10 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ed985536835ff001fd4b5e5557bdab363db03849)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 10 and the 11 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/06e56762dc89a014f82b0cb3ee4e9e24825ded1a)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between 10 and 11 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b206d7a6294d9e5e232b2a69eee3bbed302f95d5)
